subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Is it possible that neither the Yankees nor the Red Sox will finish second in the A.L. East? That neither will finish first? And can the Blue Jays keep one or both teams from the playoffs?
snippet: Is it possible that neither the Yankees nor the Red Sox will finish second in the A.L. East? That neither will finish first? And can the Blue Jays keep one or both teams from the playoffs?
